Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, the user wants 20 open-ended, thought-provoking questions based on the pseudo-BPMN representation of a smartphone supply chain process. The questions should delve into:

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Generating question ideas - Focusing on creating 20 open-ended, thought-provoking questions for the smartphone supply chain process. - Ensuring questions explore the rationale behind each step in the pseudo-BPMN representation.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Structuring questions - Prioritizing questions that prompt deeper analysis, like Why was this step prioritized in the supply chain? - Aiming to cover various aspects, such as decision points and resource allocation, to reflect process reasoning.
